
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2026-01-06 00:59:56.315975                #
#                                    #
# DO NOT MAKE CHANGES TO THIS FILE,  #
# AS IT WILL BE OVERWRITTEN          #
# Make sure you are editing the source file
# in the relevant features folder
######################################

#
# Trigger special projects from the event menu, for selected resource type
#

oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {

	set_planet_flag = oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_has_available_alloys_consolidation
	set_or_increment_variable = {
		VAR = oxr_mdlc_consolidator_orbital_resource_type_alloys
		AMOUNT = $DEPOSIT_SIZE$
	}
	enable_special_project = {
		name = "OXR_MDLC_CONSOLIDATE_alloys"
		location = this
		owner = space_owner
	}

}


oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_dark_matter_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {

	set_planet_flag = oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_has_available_dark_matter_consolidation
	set_or_increment_variable = {
		VAR = oxr_mdlc_consolidator_orbital_resource_type_dark_matter
		AMOUNT = $DEPOSIT_SIZE$
	}
	enable_special_project = {
		name = "OXR_MDLC_CONSOLIDATE_dark_matter"
		location = this
		owner = space_owner
	}

}


oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_energy_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {

	set_planet_flag = oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_has_available_energy_consolidation
	set_or_increment_variable = {
		VAR = oxr_mdlc_consolidator_orbital_resource_type_energy
		AMOUNT = $DEPOSIT_SIZE$
	}
	enable_special_project = {
		name = "OXR_MDLC_CONSOLIDATE_energy"
		location = this
		owner = space_owner
	}

}

#
# Summon ship to transport the deposit value, after special project completion
#


oxr_mdlc_planet_select_orbital_alloys_deposits_for_processing = {
	switch = {
		trigger = has_deposit

		d_alloys_1 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 1
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_1
		}

		d_alloys_2 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 2
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_2
		}

		d_alloys_3 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 3
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_3
		}

		d_alloys_4 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 4
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_4
		}

		d_alloys_5 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 5
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_5
		}

		d_alloys_6 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 6
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_6
		}

		d_alloys_7 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 7
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_7
		}

		d_alloys_8 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 8
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_8
		}

		d_alloys_9 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 9
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_9
		}

		d_alloys_10 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 10
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_10
		}

		d_alloys_11 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 11
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_11
		}

		d_alloys_12 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 12
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_12
		}

		d_alloys_13 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 13
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_13
		}

		d_alloys_14 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 14
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_14
		}

		d_alloys_15 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 15
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_15
		}

		d_alloys_16 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 16
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_16
		}

		d_alloys_17 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 17
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_17
		}

		d_alloys_18 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 18
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_18
		}

		d_alloys_19 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 19
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_19
		}

		d_alloys_20 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 20
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_20
		}

		d_alloys_21 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 21
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_21
		}

		d_alloys_22 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 22
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_22
		}

		d_alloys_23 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 23
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_23
		}

		d_alloys_24 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 24
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_24
		}

		d_alloys_25 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_alloys_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 25
			}
			remove_deposit = d_alloys_25
		}

	}
}



oxr_mdlc_planet_select_orbital_dark_matter_deposits_for_processing = {
	switch = {
		trigger = has_deposit

		d_dark_matter_1 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_dark_matter_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 1
			}
			remove_deposit = d_dark_matter_deposit_1
		}

		d_dark_matter_2 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_dark_matter_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 2
			}
			remove_deposit = d_dark_matter_deposit_2
		}

		d_dark_matter_3 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_dark_matter_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 3
			}
			remove_deposit = d_dark_matter_deposit_3
		}

		d_dark_matter_4 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_dark_matter_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 4
			}
			remove_deposit = d_dark_matter_deposit_4
		}

		d_dark_matter_5 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_dark_matter_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 5
			}
			remove_deposit = d_dark_matter_deposit_5
		}

	}
}

		}

			}

			}

		}

				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 4
			}
			remove_deposit = d_energy_4
		}

			}
			remove_deposit = d_energy_5

			}

			}

			}
			remove_deposit = d_energy_9

		d_energy_10 = {

				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 10
			}
			remove_deposit = d_energy_10
		}

	}

	switch = {
		trigger = has_deposit

		d_food_1 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_food_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 1
			}
			remove_deposit = d_food_1
		}

		d_food_2 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_food_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 2
			}
			remove_deposit = d_food_2
		}

		d_food_3 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_food_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 3
			}
			remove_deposit = d_food_3
		}

		d_food_4 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_food_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 4
			}
			remove_deposit = d_food_4
		}

		d_food_5 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_food_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 5
			}
			remove_deposit = d_food_5
		}

		d_food_6 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_food_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 6
			}
			remove_deposit = d_food_6
		}

		d_food_7 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_food_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 7
			}
			remove_deposit = d_food_7
		}

		d_food_8 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_food_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 8
			}
			remove_deposit = d_food_8
		}

		d_food_9 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_food_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 9
			}
			remove_deposit = d_food_9
		}

		d_food_10 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_food_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 10
			}
			remove_deposit = d_food_10
		}

	}
}

			}

		trigger = has_deposit

		d_society_1 = {

				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 1
			}
			remove_deposit = d_society_1
		}

		d_society_2 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_society_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 2
			}
			remove_deposit = d_society_2
		}

		d_society_3 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_society_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 3
			}
			remove_deposit = d_society_3
		}

		d_society_4 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_society_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 4
			}
			remove_deposit = d_society_4
		}

		d_society_5 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_society_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 5
			}
			remove_deposit = d_society_5
		}

		d_society_6 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_society_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 6
			}
			remove_deposit = d_society_6
		}

		d_society_7 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_society_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 7
			}
			remove_deposit = d_society_7
		}

		d_society_8 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_society_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 8
			}
			remove_deposit = d_society_8
		}

		d_society_9 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_society_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 9
			}
			remove_deposit = d_society_9
		}

		d_society_10 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_society_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 10
			}
			remove_deposit = d_society_10
		}

	}
}

		trigger = has_deposit

		d_trade_value_1 = {

				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 1
			}
			remove_deposit = d_trade_value_1
		}

		d_trade_value_2 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_trade_value_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 2
			}
			remove_deposit = d_trade_value_2
		}

		d_trade_value_3 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_trade_value_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 3
			}
			remove_deposit = d_trade_value_3
		}

		d_trade_value_4 = {

				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 4
			}
			remove_deposit = d_trade_value_4
		}

		d_trade_value_5 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_trade_value_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 5
			}
			remove_deposit = d_trade_value_5
		}

		d_trade_value_6 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_trade_value_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 6
			}
			remove_deposit = d_trade_value_6
		}

		d_trade_value_7 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_trade_value_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 7
			}
			remove_deposit = d_trade_value_7
		}

		d_trade_value_8 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_trade_value_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 8
			}
			remove_deposit = d_trade_value_8
		}

		d_trade_value_9 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_trade_value_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 9
			}
			remove_deposit = d_trade_value_9
		}

		d_trade_value_10 = {
			oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_make_orbital_trade_value_deposits_ready_for_extraction = {
				DEPOSIT_SIZE = 10
			}
			remove_deposit = d_trade_value_10
		}

	}
}
